scripts.dev-m: concurrently "bun run svelte:dev" "bun run nodemon" "bun run nodemon"
scripts.out:win: bun run svelte:build && bun run compile && electron-builder build --win --config ./build/build.js --publish never
scripts.out:mac: bun run svelte:build && bun run compile && electron-builder build --mac --config ./build/build.js --publish never
scripts.publish:win: bun run svelte:build && bun run compile && electron-builder build --win --config ./build/build.js --publish always
scripts.publish:mac: bun run svelte:build && bun run compile && electron-builder build --mac --config ./build/build.js --publish always
